message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to keep my spending within $100. Would it be possible for us to negotiate down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $100 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $110 for the product?
